issues.description: Unable to register with Dell EMC Secure Remote Services
issues.remedies:
* Make sure a valid Dell EMC license has been applied
* Make sure the SRS Gateway has not been disabled
* Verify the correct hostname or IP addr/port was used for the SRS gateway
* Verify the correct Dell EMC customer support account name and password were specified
* Verify the SRS Gateway system is running
* Check if the SRS gateway has connectivity through the firewall to Dell EMC
* Verify the network connection to the SRS gateway
* Check the health of the SRS gateway by connecting to the user interface
* Check the status of the SRS Gateway resource in the k8s cluster
* Make sure the kubernetes cluster has enabled external IP provisioning capabilities, (for example LoadBalancer)

issues.description: Unable to send events to the Dell EMC Secure Remote Service
issues.remedies:
* Verify the SRS Gateway system is running
* Check if the SRS gateway has connectivity through the firewall to Dell EMC
* Verify the network connection to the SRS gateway
* Check the health of the SRS gateway by connecting to the user interface
* View the logs of the decks and srs-notifier services for any additional details

issues.description: license is expiring or expired
issues.name: ExpiringLicense

issues.description: license is expiring or expired
issues.name: ExpiringLicense
issues.remedies:
* Check the end date of the objectscale license
* Visit the Dell EMC Software Licensing Center (SLC) to renew/extend the objectscale license.
* Contact your Dell EMC sales representative to renew/extend the objectscale license

issues.description: license is expiring or expired
issues.name: ExpiringLicense
issues.remedies:
* Check the end date of the license
* Visit the Dell EMC Software Licensing Center (SLC) to renew/extend the objectscale license.
* Contact your Dell EMC sales representative to renew/extend the objectscale license

issues.description: license is invalid
issues.name: InvalidLicense
issues.remedies:
* Verify the objectscale license was obtained from the Dell EMC Software Licensing Center
* Verify the objectscale license was not modified prior to applying it to the cluster
* Verify the PRODUCTSHORTNAME is defined in the objectscale license
* Verify the subscription dates for licensed features are still valid (not expired)

issues.description: License features no longer being tracked
issues.remedies: * Verify the objectscale license is correct and the feature was intended to be removed.

issues.description: SupportAssist configuration issues
issues.name: SupportAssistConfiguration
issues.remedies:
* Verify the supportassist-objectscale pod is Running
* Is SupportAssist still disabled?
* Verify connectivity of configured gateways.
* Verify a valid AccessKey and PIN were used.

issues.description: Provisioning of the new objectstore failed
issues.remedies: * Check the results of the provisioning job
